rocksdb_debug_ttl_read_filter_ts.name: rocksdb_debug_ttl_read_filter_ts
rocksdb_debug_ttl_read_filter_ts.type: for debugging purposes only.  overrides the ttl read filtering time to time + debug_ttl_read_filter_ts. a value of 0 denotes that the variable is not set. this variable is a no-op in non-debug builds.

rocksdb_debug_ttl_rec_ts.name: rocksdb_debug_ttl_rec_ts
rocksdb_debug_ttl_rec_ts.type: for debugging purposes only.  overrides the ttl of records to now() + debug_ttl_rec_ts. the value can be +/- to simulate a record inserted in the past vs a record inserted in the 'future'. a value of 0 denotes that the variable is not set. this variable is a no-op in non-debug builds.

rocksdb_debug_ttl_snapshot_ts.name: rocksdb_debug_ttl_snapshot_ts
rocksdb_debug_ttl_snapshot_ts.type: for debugging purposes only. sets the snapshot during compaction to now() + debug_set_ttl_snapshot_ts. the value can be positive or negative to simulate a snapshot in the past vs a snapshot created in the 'future'. a value of 0 denotes that the variable is not set. this variable is a no-op in non-debug builds.

rocksdb_enable_2pc.name: rocksdb_enable_2pc
rocksdb_enable_2pc.type: enable two phase commit for myrocks. when set, myrocks will keep its data consistent with the

rocksdb_enable_bulk_load_api.name: rocksdb_enable_bulk_load_api
rocksdb_enable_bulk_load_api.type: enables using sstfilewriter for bulk loading.

rocksdb_enable_ttl.name: rocksdb_enable_ttl
rocksdb_enable_ttl.type: enable expired ttl records to be dropped during compaction.

rocksdb_enable_ttl_read_filtering.name: rocksdb_enable_ttl_read_filtering
rocksdb_enable_ttl_read_filtering.type: for tables with ttl, expired records are skipped/filtered out during processing and in query results. disabling this will allow these records to be seen, but as a result rows may disappear in the middle of transactions as they are dropped during compaction. use with caution.

rocksdb_flush_log_at_trx_commit.name: rocksdb_flush_log_at_trx_commit
rocksdb_flush_log_at_trx_commit.type: sync on transaction commit. similar to

rocksdb_flush_memtable_on_analyze.name: rocksdb_flush_memtable_on_analyze
rocksdb_flush_memtable_on_analyze.type: forces memtable flush on analzye table to get accurate cardinality.

rocksdb_force_compute_memtable_stats.name: rocksdb_force_compute_memtable_stats
rocksdb_force_compute_memtable_stats.type: force to always compute memtable stats.

rocksdb_force_compute_memtable_stats_cac.name: rocksdb_force_compute_memtable_stats_cachetime
rocksdb_force_compute_memtable_stats_cac.type: time in usecs to cache memtable estimates.

rocksdb_force_flush_memtable_and_lzero_n.name: rocksdb_force_flush_memtable_and_lzero_now
rocksdb_force_flush_memtable_and_lzero_n.type: acts similar to force_flush_memtable_now, but also compacts all l0 files.

rocksdb_force_flush_memtable_now.name: rocksdb_force_flush_memtable_now
rocksdb_force_flush_memtable_now.type: forces memstore flush which may block all write requests so be careful.

rocksdb_force_index_records_in_range.name: rocksdb_force_index_records_in_range
rocksdb_force_index_records_in_range.type: used to override the result of records_in_range() when force index is used.

rocksdb_git_hash.name: rocksdb_git_hash
rocksdb_git_hash.type: git revision of the rocksdb library used by myrocks.

rocksdb_info_log_level.name: rocksdb_info_log_level
rocksdb_info_log_level.type: filter level for info logs to be written mysqld error log. valid values include 'debug_level', 'info_level', 'warn_level''error_level' and 'fatal_level'.

rocksdb_large_prefix.name: rocksdb_large_prefix
rocksdb_large_prefix.type: support large index prefix length of 3072 bytes. if off, the maximum index prefix length is 767.

rocksdb_lock_scanned_rows.name: rocksdb_lock_scanned_rows
rocksdb_lock_scanned_rows.type: take and hold locks on rows that are scanned but not updated.

rocksdb_lock_wait_timeout.name: rocksdb_lock_wait_timeout
rocksdb_lock_wait_timeout.type: number of seconds to wait for lock.

rocksdb_master_skip_tx_api.name: rocksdb_master_skip_tx_api
rocksdb_master_skip_tx_api.type: skipping holding any lock on row access. not effective on slave.

rocksdb_max_latest_deadlocks.name: rocksdb_max_latest_deadlocks
rocksdb_max_latest_deadlocks.type: maximum number of recent deadlocks to store.

rocksdb_max_row_locks.name: rocksdb_max_row_locks
rocksdb_max_row_locks.type: maximum number of locks a transaction can have.

rocksdb_merge_buf_size.name: rocksdb_merge_buf_size
rocksdb_merge_buf_size.type: size to allocate for merge sort buffers written out to disk during inplace index creation.

rocksdb_merge_combine_read_size.name: rocksdb_merge_combine_read_size
rocksdb_merge_combine_read_size.type: size that we have to work with during combine (reading from disk) phase of external sort during fast index creation.

rocksdb_merge_tmp_file_removal_delay_ms.name: rocksdb_merge_tmp_file_removal_delay_ms
rocksdb_merge_tmp_file_removal_delay_ms.type: fast index creation creates a large tmp file on disk during index creation.  removing this large file all at once when index creation is complete can cause trim stalls on flash. this variable specifies a duration to sleep (in milliseconds) between calling chsize() to truncate the file in chunks. the chunk size is  the same as merge_buf_size.

rocksdb_override_cf_options.name: rocksdb_override_cf_options
rocksdb_override_cf_options.type: option overrides per cf for rocksdb.

rocksdb_perf_context_level.name: rocksdb_perf_context_level
rocksdb_perf_context_level.type: perf context level for rocksdb internal timer stat collection.

rocksdb_persistent_cache_size_mb.name: rocksdb_persistent_cache_size_mb
rocksdb_persistent_cache_size_mb.type: size of cache in mb for blockbasedtableoptions::persistent_cache for rocksdb.

rocksdb_print_snapshot_conflict_queries.name: rocksdb_print_snapshot_conflict_queries
rocksdb_print_snapshot_conflict_queries.type: logging queries that got snapshot conflict errors into *.err log.

rocksdb_read_free_rpl_tables.name: rocksdb_read_free_rpl_tables
rocksdb_read_free_rpl_tables.type: list of tables that will use read-free replication on the slave (i.e. not lookup a row during replication).

rocksdb_records_in_range.name: rocksdb_records_in_range
rocksdb_records_in_range.type: used to override the result of records_in_range(). set to a positive number to override.

rocksdb_reset_stats.name: rocksdb_reset_stats
rocksdb_reset_stats.type: reset the rocksdb internal statistics without restarting the db.

rocksdb_seconds_between_stat_computes.name: rocksdb_seconds_between_stat_computes
rocksdb_seconds_between_stat_computes.type: sets a number of seconds to wait between optimizer stats recomputation. only changed indexes will be refreshed.

rocksdb_skip_bloom_filter_on_read.name: rocksdb_skip_bloom_filter_on_read
rocksdb_skip_bloom_filter_on_read.type: skip using bloom filter for reads.

rocksdb_skip_fill_cache.name: rocksdb_skip_fill_cache
rocksdb_skip_fill_cache.type: skip filling block cache on read requests.

rocksdb_skip_unique_check_tables.name: rocksdb_skip_unique_check_tables
rocksdb_skip_unique_check_tables.type: skip unique constraint checking for the specified tables.

rocksdb_store_row_debug_checksums.name: rocksdb_store_row_debug_checksums
rocksdb_store_row_debug_checksums.type: include checksums when writing index/table records.

rocksdb_strict_collation_check.name: rocksdb_strict_collation_check
rocksdb_strict_collation_check.type: enforce case sensitive collation for myrocks indexes.

rocksdb_strict_collation_exceptions.name: rocksdb_strict_collation_exceptions
rocksdb_strict_collation_exceptions.type: list of tables (using regex) that are excluded from the case sensitive collation enforcement.

rocksdb_table_stats_sampling_pct.name: rocksdb_table_stats_sampling_pct
rocksdb_table_stats_sampling_pct.type: percentage of entries to sample when collecting statistics about table properties. specify either 0 to sample everything or percentage [1..100]. by default 10% of entries are sampled.

rocksdb_tmpdir.name: rocksdb_tmpdir
rocksdb_tmpdir.type: directory for temporary files during ddl operations.

rocksdb_trace_sst_api.name: rocksdb_trace_sst_api
rocksdb_trace_sst_api.type: generate trace output in the log for each call to the sstfilewriter.

rocksdb_unsafe_for_binlog.name: rocksdb_unsafe_for_binlog
rocksdb_unsafe_for_binlog.type: allowing statement based binary logging which may break consistency.

rocksdb_update_cf_options.name: rocksdb_update_cf_options
rocksdb_update_cf_options.type: option updates per column family for rocksdb.

rocksdb_use_clock_cache.name: rocksdb_use_clock_cache
rocksdb_use_clock_cache.type: use clockcache instead of default lrucache for rocksdb.

rocksdb_validate_tables.name: rocksdb_validate_tables
rocksdb_validate_tables.type: verify all .frm files match all rocksdb tables (0 means no verification, 1 means verify and fail on error, and 2 means verify but continue.

rocksdb_verify_row_debug_checksums.name: rocksdb_verify_row_debug_checksums
rocksdb_verify_row_debug_checksums.type: verify checksums when reading index/table records.

rocksdb_wal_recovery_mode.name: rocksdb_wal_recovery_mode
rocksdb_wal_recovery_mode.type: dboptions::wal_recovery_mode for rocksdb. default is kabsoluteconsistency.

rocksdb_write_batch_max_bytes.name: rocksdb_write_batch_max_bytes
rocksdb_write_batch_max_bytes.type: maximum size of write batch in bytes. 0 means no limit.

Oqgraph_compat_mode.name: Oqgraph_compat_mode
Oqgraph_compat_mode.type: whether or not legacy tables with integer latches are supported.

Oqgraph_verbose_debug.name: Oqgraph_verbose_debug
Oqgraph_verbose_debug.type: whether or not verbose debugging is enabled. if it is, performance may be adversely impacted

Master_gtid_wait_time.type: total number of time spent in master_gtid_wait.

Rpl_semi_sync_master_net_wait_time.type: total time the master waited for slave replies, in microseconds.

Rpl_semi_sync_master_net_waits.type: total number of times the master waited for slave replies.

Rpl_semi_sync_master_no_times.type: number of times the master turned off semisynchronous replication.

Rpl_semi_sync_master_no_tx.type: number of commits that have not been successfully acknowledged by a slave.

Rpl_semi_sync_master_status.type: whether or not semisynchronous replication is currently operating on the master. the value will be

Rpl_semi_sync_master_tx_avg_wait_time.type: average time the master waited for each transaction, in microseconds.

Rpl_semi_sync_master_tx_wait_time.type: total time the master waited for transactions, in microseconds.

Rpl_semi_sync_slave_status.type: whether or not semisynchronous replication is currently operating on the slave.

spider_semi_trx_isolation.type: set consistency during range sql execution when

spider_use_table_charset.name: spider_use_table_charset
spider_use_table_charset.type: whether to use the local table

spider_xa_register_mode.type: mode of xa transaction register into system table.

thread_pool_idle_timeout.type: time in seconds until an idle worker thread exits. unix-only. use

thread_pool_max_threads.type: maximum number of threads in the thread pool. once this limit is reached, no new threads will be created.

thread_pool_min_threads.name: thread_pool_min_threads
thread_pool_min_threads.type: minimum number of threads in the thread pool. in bursty environments, after a period of inactivity, threads would normally be retired. when the next burst arrives, it would take time to reach the optimal level. setting this value higher than the default would prevent thread retirement even if inactive. windows-only. use

thread_pool_oversubscribe.type: internal parameter, not meant to be changed. the higher the value for this parameter, the more threads that could run at the same time. a lower value can lead to more sleeps and wakeups.

thread_pool_priority.type:
threadpool priority. high-priority connections usually start executing earlier than low-priority.
if set to 'auto' (the default), the actual priority (low or high) is determined by whether or not the connection is inside a transaction.

tokudb_killed_time.type: control lock tree kill callback frequency.
